page.title: 13Employment in Colden Common
page.content: The only sources of employment in the village are a building contractor and a motor engineer.The majority of the 44 staff at Marwell Zoological Park live locally but not exclusively in Colden Common. A sample survey revealed that 91% of heads of households interviewsed worked outside the village,most of them in Eastleigh,Winchester and Southampton.Of those surveyed almost 40% could be regarded as being in managerial and professional occupations. These facts reinforce the impression that Colden Common is essentially a dormitory settlement.Many of the interviewees felt that the village combined the benefits of living in the countryside with easy access to the amenities of the town,provided that private transport was available.
